mapper.select: select * from BT_BOARD order by DT_INSERT desc
mapper.insert: insert into BT_BOARD (ID_USER, DS_TITLE, DS_CONTENT) values (#{ID_USER}, #{DS_TITLE}, #{DS_CONTENT})
mapper.update: update BT_BOARD set ID_USER = #{ID_USER}, DS_TITLE = #{DS_TITLE}, DS_CONTENT = #{DS_CONTENT}, DT_UPDATE = getdate() where NO_SEQ = #{NO_SEQ}
